description:
The mahjong match between Urabe and the fake Akagi has dragged on for so long that the wager is now at 32 million. The boss of the Kawada group now realizes that the fake Akagi is lacking something as a gambler and wants to switch him with the real Akagi instead. However Akagi will only play under one condition... let Osamu play first.
Source: crunchyroll
